metadata.description: At right of title: B. no. 11, D. 53
Signed, p. [1]: Élie Lacoste, président; Cambacérès et Michaud, secrétaires
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
"Loi relative à la formation d'un livre de bienfaisance nationale, dont la rédaction est substituée à celle de la loi du 22 floréal, imprimée sous le no. 2348. B. no. 11, D. 54"--P. [1]-8
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title on cover. Damaged, stained pages and cover.
